title: The Ultimate Jailor

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: > Use one of your many abilities.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> You have access to every jailor-like role (Jailor, Wisteria, Author, X-Ray, etc.)

> Each jailor-like role has their own separate executions (If you use an execution as Jailor, you still have all your executions for Warden).

fields.name: Win Con:
fields.value: > Kill all who oppose being jailed. (NK goal)

desc:
Post 1994
*Go to jail. Go directly to jail. Do not pass "Go." Do not collect $200.*
